show_name: Betsu ni Anta no Tame ni Ōkiku Nattan Janain Dakara ne!! (OAV)
other_title: I Did Not Grow These For You
I Totally Don't Even Care About Your Erection!
別にアンタの為に大きくなったんじゃないんだからねっ!! (Japanese)
plot: Kaoru learns at a social gathering that a high class lady should be good at fellatio, paizuri and a list of other things she's totally oblivious about. The next day she orders one of her male servants to help her go through that list.
